item.title: Any idea why this isnt working out?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

So, as before, i was adding God Capes to my server where you click the statue, and you get the cape spawned on the floor.

here is the code.

the int

public int resetanim = 8;

The method

public void TakeCape(String god, int reqSkillNum, int lvlReq, int XPSkillNum, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) { if(theifTimer == 0) { if(playerLevel[reqSkillNum] >= lvlReq) { setAnimation(emote); sM("You bow down to "+god); sM("You recieve the cape of "+god+"."); addItem(item, itemAmount); theifTimer = delay; } else if(playerLevel[reqSkillNum] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a "+statName[reqSkillNum]+" level of "+lvlReq+" to pray to "+god+"."); } } }

The actual thingy…

[code]case 2873:
TakeCape(“Saradomin”, 16, 99, 16, 5000, 2412, 1, 60, 645);
resetanim = 6;
break;

case 2875:
TakeCape(“Guthix”, 15, 99, 15, 5000, 2413, 1, 60, 645);
resetanim = 6;
break;

case 2874:
TakeCape(“Zamorak”, 20, 99, 20, 5000, 2414, 1, 60, 645);
resetanim = 6;
break;[/code]

Everything compiles, etc. but i click the object, and nothing happens.

Any help would be appreciated, thank you (:

Read full topic
item.source: Any idea why this isnt working out?
